name: COMMUNITY GENERAL OSTEOPATHIC HOSPITAL v. DAUPHIN COUNTY BOARD OF ASSESSMENT APPEALS, the County of Dauphin, Lower Paxton Township and Central Dauphin School District. Petition of Dauphin County
name_abbreviation: Community General Osteopathic Hospital v. Dauphin County Board of Assessment Appeals
docket_number: Petitions Nos. 265 and 266 M.D. Allocatur Dockets 1998

parties: COMMUNITY GENERAL OSTEOPATHIC HOSPITAL v. DAUPHIN COUNTY BOARD OF ASSESSMENT APPEALS, the County of Dauphin, Lower Paxton Township and Central Dauphin School District. Petition of Dauphin County.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 21st day of July, 2000, the petitions for allowance of appeal are granted. The order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed. Wilson Area School District v. Easton Hospital, 561 Pa. 1, 747 A.2d 877 (2000).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
754 A.2d 679
COMMUNITY GENERAL OSTEOPATHIC HOSPITAL v. DAUPHIN COUNTY BOARD OF ASSESSMENT APPEALS, the County of Dauphin, Lower Paxton Township and Central Dauphin School District. Petition of Dauphin County.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 21, 2000.
Kenneth Chestek, Erie, for petitioner.
